member.name: D2D1_BEZIER_SEGMENT
member.summary: Represents a cubic bezier segment drawn between two points.

member.name: D2D1_BEZIER_SEGMENT.point1
member.summary: The first control point for the Bezier segment.

member.name: D2D1_BEZIER_SEGMENT.point2
member.summary: The second control point for the Bezier segment.

member.name: D2D1_BEZIER_SEGMENT.point3
member.summary: The end point for the Bezier segment.
